svg.style: font-family: 'Helvetica Neue', Helvetica, Arial, sans-serif; font-size: 18px; background-color: white; text-rendering: optimizeLegibility; -webkit-font-smoothing: antialiased;

text.tspan: Children per woman by GDP per capita, 2014
Children per woman (total fertility rate) by income (GDP per capita in int-$)
Penn World Table 9.0 (Real GDP at chained PPPs in 2011US$)
Source: Penn World Table 9.0 (2016), UN Population Division (2017 Revision)
Note: Size of country bubbles are representative of population size. Bubble coloring is representative of continent.
